answers.answer: Nope. Which can be not so fun. Take a snack with you for after the draw and make sure you write down exactly what time you started and finished the drink. What flavor did you get?
I was allowed to eat "bland" before my test.  I had scrambled eggs and sausage.  I passed the test!
Depends on the Dr. I could, I never had to have a fasting test. Good luck. I would just call and see what your Dr wants.
Depends if its the hour long one which you can eat but the 3 hour one you have to fast for it..doctor should have explained it to you

question: Can I eat before my glucose diabetes blood test?
title: glucose diabetes blood test
